text: Montréal-la-Cluse is a commune in the Ain department in eastern France. It is located in the historical region of Bugey and its inhabitants are known as the Montréalais. ==Transport== The town is served by the Haut Bougey railway line and by a branch line to Oyonnax. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== *INSEE ==External links== * Official website Category:Communes of Ain Category:Ain communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Montréal-la-Cluse
